video.title: Por Ella Soy Eva
video.synopsis: Juan Carlos Caballero, a notorious Don Juan, is forced to walk a mile in a woman's shoes disguised as Eva to win back Helena, the love of his life.

episodes.synopsis: After the car crash a bereaved Helena visits Juan Carlos's tomb on his birthday to remember the love they shared, along with betrayal and heartbreak.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Single mom Helena is furious with Groupo Imperio after they fire her, so when Juan Carlos calls for help on a new account, she refuses and hangs up.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Back with the firm, Helena is in charge of a new project. Juan Carlos takes on the persona of Juan Perón to seduce her and steal the client.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Still masquerading as Perón, Juan Carlos convinces Helena to show him around Acapulco -- certain he'll seduce her and steal the Playa Mahahua account.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos enjoys a trip to Acapulco with Helena and her son, until young "Lalito" temporarily disappears and discovers that Juan is up to no good.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: After Juan's plan falls apart, Helena confides in him about her past and Juan confesses his love; meanwhile, Plutarco steals Helena's big project.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Helena takes Juan to meet her mother Silvia, who warns Juan not to hurt her daughter; meanwhile, Lalito is upset when he sees Juan kiss his mother.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: After Helena's father nearly discovers Juan in the bath, the family teams up to keep the two men apart and ensure Eduardo's blood pressure stays low.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Helplessly in love with Helena and hoping to marry her, Juan Carlos searches for a way to free himself of the project without endangering her career.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos decides the best way to avoid hurting Helena is to leave; Plutarco builds his plot to ruin Juan.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The lovebirds are caught kissing when Onésimo inadvertendly snaps their picture; Juan Carlos confesses that Helena is the love of his life.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Even though Juan and Helena make plans to marry, Helena's father still doesn't trust Juan; meanwhile, Plutarco plans his million dollar fraud scheme.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The firm anxiously presents Playa Majajua proposals to the tourism commission, and Helena is surprised when Juan's real name is revealed at the event.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Just as Plutarco planned, Juan is accused of embezzlement; however, he escapes and swears his innocence to Helena but meets with a tragic accident.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: As the announcement of Juan Carlos's untimely death reaches the newspapers, Helena mourns her lost love and Adriano begins to doubt Juan's guilt.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Despite Plutarco's claims that Juan is guilty of fraud, Helena confesses to Juan's tomb that she still loves him; however, is Juan Carlos really dead?
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Mimi discovers Juan Carlos isn't dead but agrees to keep his secret; Juan attends Santiago's wedding in disguise, and Plutarco tries to hire Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Fernando, Rebecca and Santiago conspire with Helena; meanwhile, Juan is willing to do whatever it takes to be near the love of his life again.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Dressed as "Eva," Juan returns to Groupo Imperio and tries to interview with Adriano for the job of assistant, but will anyone recognize him?
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: After Adriano tells Eva she's not qualified for the job, she cries and convinces him to give her the interview and test her tourism industry knowledge.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca doesn't hide her jealousy over Helena's accomplishment; Diego's arrival complicates Juan Carlos's plans; and Lalito disappears into the park.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco lets Helena know he's impressed with her hard work; meanwhile, Diego asks married Marcela on a date, and Eva's prying irritates Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Helena fires Eva after the incident with Lalito, and a desperate Juan Carlos considers telling Helena the truth to convince her to change her mind.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: With Plutarco's wife in the hospital, Eva's job with the company is on shaky ground and Plutarco uses his wife's absence to get closer to Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Furious over Plutarco's attention toward Helena, a jealous Rebecca plots revenge and threatens to reveal their long-standing affair to his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos risks his secret identity when he leaves an apologetic message for Helena; and Diego Fonticoda will meet with Helena but only at night.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca flies into a jealous rage after Helena is promoted, Antonia threatens suicide and Helena gets a big suprise when she visits Juan Carlos's tomb.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: As Plutarco and Helena grow closer, Eva suggests Helena find out if Juan Carlos died loving her or cheating, so she visits his parents for answers.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Helena visits Juan Carlos's parents and learns about his surprising plans before "dying," while a suspicious Plutarco tells Onésimo to spy on Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: While Plutarco hunts for an apartment to turn into his "love nest" with Helena, a jealous Antonia confronts Helena about her feelings toward Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Eva and Helena head to Eduardo's house to take Lalito to his new home, but Eduardo stops them with a court order and a lawsuit for parental custody.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Eva tries to console Helena, who is worried about losing her son to Eduardo; Eva and Mimi search for the "witness" who accused Juan of fraud.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Mimi and Juan plan for Eva to use her friendship with Antonia to hunt for evidence inside the house; meanwhile, Marcela returns to Grupo Imperio.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: When Antonia invites Eva to go out for a night of dancing, Plutarco returns to Rebeca's bed and confesses his involvement in framing Juan Carlos.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Helena's father has a heart attack caused by the custody battle, and Eva tries to keep Plutarco from using Eduardo's illness to get closer to Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos's secret is nearly revealed when Eva spends the night at Helena's and shares her bed. Antonia and Rebeca face off with Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Eva moves in with Helena, forcing Juan Carlos to fight romantic urges.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: The staff at Grupo Impero plan a big weekend getaway in Acpulco with the exception of Plutarco, who stays behind with plans to seduce Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca finds out that Plutarco is spending the weekend with Helena and Lalito, and Antonia is shocked when she sees Juan Carlos transforming to Eva.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: After listening to Juan Carlos's suspicions that Plutarco is trying to seduce Helena, Antonia heads home to catch her husband in bed with Rebecca.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Eva begs for Antonia's forgiveness and Adriano puts Helena in charge of Grupo Impero, causing Rebeca to fly into another jealous rage.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco cooks up a scheme to trick Helena into spending the night with him. Juan is horrified when Adriano invites Eva to dinner.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Juan is worried that his identity will be revealed at the reading of Antonia's will, but a huge surprise is in store for everyone -- especially Eva.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Onesima discovers that Eva lied on her résumé. Helena finally confronts her abusive father and warns she's going to take Lalito away.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco confesses his romantic feelings for Helena, who responds that he's emotionally confused because he's in mourning for Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Silvia panics when she discovers Eduardo is going to kidnap Lalito, Plutarco apologizes to Helena and Rebeca has a proposal for Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca blackmails Plutarco to get a diamond engagement ring, Eva tells Helena about Plutarco's lies and Helena is officially named a company partner.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Eva and Mimi track down Maximiliano Montes, Silvia confronts Plutarco about his feelings for Helena and Adriano wants Helena to hire Renato.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: While Mimi helps Eva search for evidence to clear Juan Carlos's reputation, Eva confesses she can't stand to watch Plutarco put moves on Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Samanta confesses to Eva that she terminated her pregnancy, and Helena decides to stop being angry with Juan Carlos and give love another chance.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Eva and Lucía help Helena move Lalito from Eduardo's house, but someone from Helena's past shows up to complicate an already distressing situation.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Lalito spend time to get to know each other, and Eva is suspicious when Mario asks Helana to a dinner discussion of Lalito's future.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Juan tries convincing Mario to abandon his child custody effort for Lalito, and Plutarco has a similar plan -- except with thugs and a pistol.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Mario abandons plans to take Lalito from Helena, thanks to a "friend" who convinces him to return to the U.S.; Mimi becomes Eva's assistant.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Juan's cover is almost blown when Helena unexpectedly shows up at Eva's boarding house; meanwhile, Rebeca whines about Plutarco's lack of attention.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Eva suspects seduction as Adrian's true motivation for inviting her and Mimi to Las Vegas. Plutarco worries that Rebeca will betray him.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Santiago and Patty are planning a wedding, though Santiago is certain he's making the right choice and Patty isn't sure she's ready to get married.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Mimi and Juan are shocked to hear Adriano confess his love for Eva, and Plutarco begs Helena's forgiveness for the problems he caused at the company.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Helena's son helps her realize that she hasn't smiled since Juan Carlos has been gone, and Juan takes a risky step to make sure his mother is all right.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Helena tells Eva to consider dating Adriano, but Eva tells her lovesick suitor to give up. She hears shocking news about Juan Carlos's father.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Silvia is convinced Plutarco would be a good father for Lalito, and Helena's father becomes suspicious of Eva after they take a car ride together.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos's mother has mixed feelings when she finds out her son is alive. Eva tries to track down Modesto's other wife and son.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to scare Plutarco into marriage, Rebeca threatens to show Adriano a video of them having sex. Eva has a heart-to-heart talk with Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Helena helps Adriano arrange an over-the-top romantic gesture to win her affection. Plutarco corners Helena and begs for her affection.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Reeling from Eva's rejection, Adriano resigns from Grupo Impero, making Plutarco company president.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Silvia is thrilled when Helena confesses she and Plutarco are a couple; still, Helena implores Plutarco to be discreet about their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco is worried Rebeca will show their sex video to Adriano; then, he faces off with Eva when she shows up during his dinner date with Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco finally confesses his love for Helena to Adriano, and Helena has a heartfelt chat with Eva about leaving the past behind.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca tries to confront Helena and Plutarco; meanwhile, Juan Carlos is weary of secrets and wants to get Helena back as soon as possible.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca can't accept the loss of her former love, and after learning that Plutarco is making Helena a romantic dinner, she plots deadly revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Eva finds herself in an uncomfortable position with Adriano when she agrees to have an innocent dinner. He insists on a kiss to show his love.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Hunting for evidence to clear his reputation, Juan Carlos is overcome with jealousy when he comes across proof that Plutarco is in love with Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: A grief-stricken Juan Carlos takes a risk in revealing himself when he visits a hospitalized Helena. While she sleeps, he begs her to keep fighting.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: A recovering Helena is shocked when Juan Carlos appears in her hospital room to confess the truth, but even Helena's mother won't believe he's alive.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Eva is horrified when she spies Plutarco and Helena kissing. Rebeca suspects that Eva and Juan Carlos might be the same person.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Eva is determined to convince Helena that Plutarco is not a good romantic choice, and Eugenia mistakenly tells Rebeca that Juan is actually Eva.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Now that she knows the truth about Juan Carlos, a scheming Rebeca is determined to expose him to everyone, so she insists Eva try on underwear.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca adds fuel to her gossip fire when she pressures Adriano into admitting there is a romantic (but secret) relationship between him and Eva
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Eva's rejection of Adriano and her refusal to let him get near her causes the lovesick owner of Grupo Impero to fly into an offended rage.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Adriano announces his engagement to Eva and implies the two had an "intimate" encounter. Rebeca loses interest in her Juan-as-Eva suspicions.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Eva signs over her Grupo Impero shares to help fund the rehiring of a hundred female employees. Plutarco has a party and a huge question for Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: The events at Plutarco's party causes Eva to drink too much, but Mimi comes to Juan's rescue. Helena questions her feelings for Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to prevent Helena from marrying the man responsible for Juan Carlos's framing, Eva attempts to persuade Helena she doesn't love Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: After Helena tells Eva she intends to concentrate on her future with Plutarco, Juan is resolved to reveal the evil side of Helena's fiancé.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos's mother visits Grupo Impero and triggers suspicions. Plutarco convinces Renato that playing dirty will get him ahead at the company.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco and Helena head to a romantic dinner where Plutarco spends the evening talking about all the plans he has for their married life together.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Mendoza reports the results of the Juan Carlos fraud investigation to Adriano, Plutarco, and Eva, and the troubling details gives Adriano chest pains.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Renato becomes Adriano's assistant, Plutarco works on the next phase of his Playa Majahua project scam and Rebeca betrays Renato's confidence.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is still discussing whether Renato is gay; Helena decides to take a vacation; and Juan plans to investigate the missing funds in New York.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Helena and Lalito head to Playa Majahua in the hopes Helena can finally forget about Juan Carlos forever; instead, she receives a shocking surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Stunned to find out that Juan is still alive, Helena insists her love for Plutarco is real. Juan tries to convince Helena that Plutarco is no good.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Juan finally has a chance to explain everything to Eugenia, Carmen is diagnosed and Modesto walks in on his two wives' conversation about him.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Juan forces his mother to listen to the truth about his disappearance; meanwhile, Renato discovers financial irregularities implicating Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Juan begs Helena to keep his secret a while longer so he has time to clear his name, and Eva agrees to Plutarco's double wedding idea.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: In a company meeting, Adriano announces the results of the investigation show that someone has been embezzling money from Grupo Impero.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Onésimo warns Plutarco it's not a good idea to fire Rebeca; meanwhile, Rebeca decides it's time to show a scandalous videotape to Adriano.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Juan tries to convince Helena to meet with him, Rebecca pleads with Adriano for her job and Helena decides to sneak a look at Plutarco's computer.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Eva notices that Helena is more distracted than usual and pressures her for answers; Helena emotionally confesses that Juan Carlos is still alive.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Helena is torn between her love for Juan and her promise to Plutarco; meanwhile, Juan Carlos waits to meet with Helena but isn't sure she'll show up.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos begs Helena's help in getting him released from jail. He even kisses her as proof to the police that they're a "married" couple.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Mimi accompanies Adriano to a health checkup.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Helena starts to distance herself from Plutarco and admits to Adriano that after what happened with Fernando, she doubts Juan Carlos's guilt.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Adriano and Helena begin to suspect Eva might be involved in the Juan Carlos fraud, and Helena is surprised to learn Eva is Eugenia's friend.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Eva threatens to "out" Renato if he doesn't break it off with Lucia, and Helena demands Mimi let her search for evidence for fraud in Eva's room.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Helena's suspicions about Eva have reached a peak, but Eugenia steps in with an explanation and Silvia is tired of putting up with Eduardo's abuse.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Though she believes Juan Carlos is innocent, Helena swears their relationship hasn't changed and Plutarco's connection to Mendoza becomes clearer.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Helena confides in Eva that she's going to Ixtapa with Plutarco, and Eva has some sound advice for the trip.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Renato finally tells Lucia he's gay, and Juan Carlos complains to Mimi that Helena doesn't care about him because he saw her kissing Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: In Ixtapa, Helena nearly gives in to Plutarco's romantic overture, but a fire alarm mysteriously sounds; Helena believes Juan Carlos is the culprit.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: A melancholy Helena walks along the beach, remembering her time there with Juan. Modesto visits Carmen in the hospital to tell her he loves her.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Helena tells Plutarco that nothing in life is certain, including romance; meanwhile, Marcella finds out Fernando only pretends to have a job.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Fernando confesses to Eva he struggles with his role as man of the house. Silvia tells Helena that Plutarco can be a "Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde."
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Helena tells Eva she is ashamed to have mistrusted her but is certain Eva would never betray her. Juan is challenged to disclose his past.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Helena admits to Eva that even though she still has feelings for Juan Carlos, she's worried he'll return to his deceitful ways and cheat on her again.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Eva tries to convince Renata to visit a dying Carmen in the hospital, and Juan tells Mimi Renato's real name and his connection to Juan's family.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Mimi tells Juan she's convinced Rebeca is conspiring with Plutarco on the fraud; Carmen wakes up in time to mend her relationship with Renato.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Helena is angry with Plutarco for encouraging Lalito to cheat, and Eva does what she can to keep Renato from discovering he's Modesto's son.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: A Playa Majahua councilman tells Helena there is gross project mismanagement by someone inside Grupo Impero, so she confronts Plutarco.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Adriano is furious with Helena for hiding information about the Playa scandal, and Plutarco swears to Helena he didn't tell the truth to protect her.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Helena challenges Juan Carlos to confront Plutarco in front of Adriano. Eduardo does his best to repair his relationship with Sylvia.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Juan realizes that Helena still loves him; Plutarco can't resist Rebeca's advances, and Helena tells Plutarco she has something urgent to discuss.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos is deliriously happy when Helena phones Eva to announce her relationship with Plutarco has ended and the wedding is cancelled.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Eva rushes to Helena's house for details of the breakup with Plutarco, and Helena admits that she still loves Juan and will give him another chance.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia's condition is getting worse, and the doctor suspects something might be wrong with her medication; Claudia has a nasty secret.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: While the doctors take care of Eugenia, Juan makes plans to win Helena back; however, Plutarco begs for another chance with a huge floral bouquet.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia finds out who was switching her medicine, and Plutarco whines to Adriano that Eva is the reason Helena broke off their engagement.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca lectures Helena on the values of being married, and that leaving Plutarco was a bad decision because nobody else will marry a single mother.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Helena tells Eva that her heart and body desire Juan Carlos above all others and, despite company rumors, she and Plutarco were never intimate.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Helena admits to Eva that her "date" with Juan was sad because she can't forget his past lies; Juan tries to understand what women want.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: While in Acapulco, Helena discovers a shocking truth about the Playa project and Rebeca spreads lies about Helena and the councilman.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Helena ignores Plutarco's attempts to reconcile; instead, she reminds him their relationship is professional and they shouldn't be alone together.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Don Adriano's Acapulco plans include being with Eva all day and night, but he's disappointed when Eva refuses to share a hotel room with him.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Helena is weary of Plutarco's romantic gestures and attempts to distance herself; meanwhile, Rebeca has Onésimo search Plutarco's home for evidence.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Much to everyone's surprise, Plutarco makes a public spectacle of himself in an attempt to win Helena's love and Helen announces her decision.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: The Acapulco trip concludes with a costume party while Juan makes a heartfelt apology to Helena for his past mistakes -- but will she forgive him?
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Mimi learns that Helena and Juan are reconciled but wonders what will happen to Eva. Plutarco is plotting something sinister with Mr. Fairbanks.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Despite Modesto's displeasure, Adriano calls a Grupo Impero staff meeting to reveal that Renato is Juan Carlos's half-brother.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Trouble between Helena and Plutarco escalates into a physical confrontation, Eva comes to Helena's defense and Adriano loses consciousness.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Helena stays with Juan in Acapulco to relax and rekindle their romance; meanwhile, Mimi is shocked by an unexpected guest at the boarding house.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: On holiday with Eva, Juan plans to reveal his secret identity to Helena, and back in Mexico, Onésimo tells Rebeca he had the three million dollars.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Mimi calls Juan to warn him not to return home or risk a confrontation with his real cousin, Eva, the actual owner of the boarding house.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Helena confronts Plutarco on the Playa project and he questions her about her time in Acapulco. Mimi introduces the two Evas.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Helena questions Eva about her relationship with Adriano and scolds she should never lie to anyone, including Adriano.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Helena asks Eva if she can use her room as a "love nest" with Juan; Plutarco fires Rebeca; and the "real" Eva shows her rough side to Dagoberto.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Eva chastises Plutarco for his "reign of terror" over the past three days; and Mimi tells Juan about evil Eva's questionable business practices.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Marcela is shocked when she finds out the truth about Fernando's blindness. Eva/Juan wants to inform the police about crazy Eva's bordello.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Eva and Mimi are terrified when crazy Eva holds them at gunpoint, and Interpol detectives show up looking for a criminal known as "Itsy, Bitsy Spider."
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Eva becomes a paparazzi target when she's linked to the criminal Yadhira Rivers; and Juan tells Mimi it's time he reveals his alter ego to Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Helena receives a call from Eduardo and is forced to cancel her date with Juan Carlos, postponing his confession. Mimi leaves the boarding house.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is determined to have his way with Jennifer, until Claudia speaks up. Mendoza's corrupt services are requested by both Plutarco and Rebecca.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco calls a meeting to accuse Helena of betraying the company, and Adriano returns home to find Mimi gone and his company in turmoil.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Mimi tells Juan Carlos she's pregnant with Adriano's baby, but Rebecca's eavesdrops on their conversation and spreads vicious rumors about Eva.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: Juan attempts to gather evidence and prove his innocence before Eva and Adriano's wedding day.Mendoza is shocked to discover Eva's secret.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Onésimo comes to Eva's rescue, Mendoza meets a much deserved fate, and Juan is rushed to the hospital where he tells all to Fernando and Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca blackmails Plutarco, Adriano insists Eva see a gynecologist, Eva is elected "woman of the year" and Adriano says Plutarco is no longer in charge.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Helena confesses to Lalito that Juan Carlos is alive and arranges an emotional reunion. Meanwhile, Rebeca forces Renato to admit he's gay to Adriano.
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: Helena convinces Eva to be photographed as "woman of the year." Meanwhile, Adriano comforts Mimi, leading to a surprisingly intimate moment.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: On Adriano and Eva's wedding day, Plutarco discovers Eva's huge secret. Eva wants to reveal she is really Juan Carlos.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: After the secret is revealed, Adriano is rushed to hospital with a heart attack, the police charge Juan Carlos with murder and Helena is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Helena tells Silvia she's going to have Juan Carlos's baby, Adriano suffers a tragic fate and Plutarco becomes president of Grupo Impero.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos escapes from jail after learning that Helena plans to marry Plutarco. Lucia steals Plutarco's fake passports to give to Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco's evil plot finally blows up, leading to his arrest, trial, conviction, and a satisfying conclusion to Helena and Juan's bittersweet romance.
episodes.title: Episode 162
